subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] I am new here
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1250907451
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi Alan,
 
I also am a Spiritualist, that is, Christian  Spiritualist, I have some 
really great files, not on here because they would  take up too much room, I 
have tested the spirits, and I have found them to be on  the level, some are 
from lower planes, others are from the high planes, crossed  over, and one is 
telling me now, "Heaven."  I am starting to get good at  understanding what 
they say, so I am not always tapping them, I usually do a  short tape each 
day or every other day.  I love them all, and I am told  every day that I am 
loved as well, it's a great feeling.
Hope you enjoy these groups, I belong to 5 now, I find  them to be all 
great and very informative. Snowfire
 
 
In a message dated 8/21/2009 8:54:44 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time,  
alan.story@... writes:

 
 
 
I am new to the group, I am a practicing Spiritualist but have never done  
any EVP work. How reliable is the info you are getting, have any of you 
tested  the entities/voices? What are some of the best messages  received?
